Text:
I usually don't care if the movie is rated low, I will still download and give it a go.  Until I read this review 

"This is a Drama with a couple zombies thrown in.."

And  

"About a couple and their martial problems"

No thanks.   To each his own.   But just a heads up out there.   =)   

Hey on the other hand.  It might be the first movie about zombies your girlfriend will like watching with you?  Who knows...

wow ..^^ glad my chick might dig this... so wtf do i do while being bored insane :) haha.. guess the pay off worth it,... w00t

Thanx mang
